plot: Neville and Jason run into a familiar face. Rachel and Gene's relationship remains strained. Aaron continues to have strange visions.

Aaron has made his escape and wakes up in the library along with Cynthia who is also alive. He meets a young boy who strikes him as being vaguely familiar. He learns a great deal about the nanotechnology and why he seems to have these superhuman powers. Miles, Rachel and Charlie also make their way out of Willoughby trying to catch up to Aaron. Rachel feels guilty at having left her father behind. A dying Dr. Horn is in pursuit. Traveling on the train with Roger Allenford, Tom Neville is shocked to see someone from his past.—garykmcd
